thread.section_title: Cruisesalefinder Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Cruisesalefinder | cruisesalefinder.com.au
thread.title: Lauren Ramsay

author: Lauren Ramsay
title: Lauren Ramsay
text:
I tried to book a particular cruise and room type direct with the cruiseliner, however they advised they didn't have any rooms. I would have had to upgrade to a much more expensive room or change to another cruise months later if I hadn't checked with Cruisesalefinder.
Cruisesalefinder were able to confirm within 12hrs that I had the booking!
Thanks! We are very excited!
